profile_positions.description:
•	Defined and implemented test automation architecture, strategies, and best practices to drive efficiency and scalability.
•	Designed and developed automation frameworks using Python, integrating with industry-standard tools such as Selenium, PyTest, and Robot Framework.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to identify automation opportunities, prioritize test cases, and streamline testing processes.
•	Led the implementation of continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines for seamless integration of automation into software development workflows like JENKINS and AZURE .
•	Mentored and provided technical guidance to automation engineers, ensuring adherence to coding standards, best practices, and industry trends.
•	Conducted code reviews and performed quality assurance activities to maintain code integrity and enhance automation effectiveness.
•	Collaborated with stakeholders to define and implement API testing and integration strategies using Python libraries and frameworks.
•	Implemented performance testing and monitoring solutions to assess application scalability and performance under various loads
profile_positions.title: Architect

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed and executed test strategies and plans for medical device testing, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and industry standards.
•	Designed and implemented automated test frameworks and scripts to improve testing efficiency and accuracy mostly in python , Ruby 
•	Involved in API development and designing automation frameworks for the medical device (Python FLASK)
•	Conducted functional, performance, and usability testing of medical devices, identifying defects and driving timely resolutions.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including engineers and designers, to define test requirements and ensure comprehensive test coverage.
•	Assisted in the creation and maintenance of quality documentation, including standard operating procedures (SOPs) and work instructions.
profile_positions.title: Senior Technical Lead

profile_positions.description:
•	Led a team of mobile testers and automation engineers, providing guidance, mentorship, and technical expertise.
•	Designed and implemented test strategies and plans for mobile applications, ensuring comprehensive test coverage and adherence to quality standards.
•	Developed and maintained mobile test automation frameworks using industry-leading tools and technologies (e.g., Appium, ).
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define testing requirements, prioritize test cases, and track progress throughout the software development lifecycle.
•	Conducted functional, regression, performance, and usability testing of mobile applications on various platforms (iOS and Android).
•	Integrated automated tests into CI/CD pipelines, enabling continuous testing and deployment of mobile applications. 
•	Analyzed test results, identified defects, and worked closely with developers to facilitate their resolution.
•	Implemented and monitored mobile test metrics, providing actionable insights to improve software quality and testing efficiency.
•	Mentored team members, fostering their growth and ensuring their alignment with best practices and industry standards.
•	Participated in continuous process improvement initiatives, driving efficiency and effectiveness in mobile testing and automation practices.
profile_positions.title: QA Analyst

profile_positions.description:
•	Developed and maintained Python-based automation frameworks, enabling efficient and reliable test automation across multiple projects and applications.
•	Designed and executed automated test scripts for functional, regression, and performance testing, ensuring comprehensive test coverage.
•	Collaborated with QA teams to identify and prioritize test cases for automation, streamlining the testing process and reducing manual effort.
•	Integrated automated tests with CI/CD pipelines, enabling continuous integration and deployment of software releases.
•	Conducted API testing and integration using Python libraries and tools to ensure seamless communication between systems and applications.
•	Worked closely with developers and business analysts to understand system requirements and translate them into automated test scripts.
•	Performed troubleshooting and debugging of automation scripts, identifying and resolving issues to maintain optimal performance.
profile_positions.title: Asso.Consultant Engineering

profile_positions.description:
•	Conducted thorough testing of DOCSIS profiles to assess network performance, identify potential bottlenecks, and optimize network configuration.
•	Analyzed network infrastructure components, including cable modems, routers, switches, and CMTS (Cable Modem Termination System).
•	Utilized specialized testing tools to measure signal strength, throughput, latency, and other key performance indicators.
•	Developed and executed test plans, ensuring adherence to industry standards and best practices.
•	Collaborated with cross-functional teams, including network engineers and system administrators, to identify and resolve network issues.
•	Documented test results, generated reports, and presented findings to stakeholders, providing actionable insights for network optimization.
•	Stayed abreast of industry trends and advancements in DOCSIS technology to continually enhance testing methodologies and procedures.
profile_positions.title: Senior software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Conducted end-to-end testing of network infrastructure components, including routers, switches, firewalls, and load balancers.
•	Executed test plans and scenarios, ensuring the adherence to established quality standards and project requirements.
•	Developed and maintained test environments and test data, ensuring accuracy and completeness for effective testing.
•	Performed network performance testing, including bandwidth measurement, latency analysis, and throughput evaluation.
•	Collaborated with network engineers and developers to troubleshoot and resolve network issues identified during testing.
•	Documented test results, identified defects, and tracked their resolution through effective bug tracking systems.
•	Assisted in the development and enhancement of automation scripts and frameworks to improve testing efficiency.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer

profile_positions.description:
•	Conducted manual testing of network infrastructure components, including routers, switches, firewalls, and load balancers.
•	Developed comprehensive test plans, including test objectives, test cases, and test data, to ensure thorough testing coverage.
•	Executed test cases and documented test results, clearly identifying defects and issues for prompt resolution.
•	Collaborated with network engineers, system administrators, and developers to troubleshoot and resolve network-related defects.
•	Performed network protocol testing, including TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, and VPN, to ensure proper functionality and interoperability.
•	Conducted network security testing to identify vulnerabilities and ensure compliance with security standards and best practices.
•	Participated in the review and analysis of technical requirements and specifications to provide testing inputs and ensure testability.
•	Developed scripts for Network devices like CMTS and edge router features in TCL/TK and PERL.
profile_positions.title: SSE
